Articles.Content:
Dunno if it would count as a bug but my screen now has 7 dV buttons.  Only one has any info.  Any known way to remove them?    Ps4     edit.. The icons persist to the title screen as well... Also my contracts seem to disappear.  Going to look in to when and why...Wasnt paying attention to them, but it seems i got paid ... Had several orbit and rescue contracts. Rescued one kerbal.  Put a satellite into munar orbit and got no transmission of completion so i go to check parameters and theres no contracts.  The other two rescues remain in their orbits but no 'mission' for them ???  But i do have anothe dV icon now... They disappear on reload

 

Edited December 13, 2019 by Flip665
Also having problems with contracts disappearing. Very annoying.

There is a reported entry in the bug tracker for it here: https://bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com/issues/24477

It looks like the extra icons get added when engines are removed and replaced in the VAB, and then the delta-v app creates a new instance to report the delta-v for the new engine.

I don't know of a workaround yet.
